pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zi-O NEXT TIME: Geiz, Majesty (2020, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:zi_o/riders/geiz)Kamen Rider Geiz$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l) while having the $(l:decade/arsenal/neo_diendriver)Neo Diendriver$(/l) in your inventory
